name: Recycled plastic exports - Brooks et al. (2018)
title: Recycled plastic exports - Brooks et al. (2018)
description: Cumulative export of plastics over the period 1988-2016 by the top 10 exporting countries. This is measured across several variables: economic value, tonnage, and share of global exports of plastics.

sources.dataPublishedBy: Brooks, A. L., Wang, S., & Jambeck, J. R. (2018). The Chinese import ban and its impact on global plastic waste trade. Science Advances, 4(6), eaat0131
sources.additionalInfo: Cumulative export of plastics over the period 1988-2016 by the top 10 exporting countries. This is measured across several variables: economic value, tonnage, and share of global exports of plastics.
